channel.title: Posts on Hanjun Kim's Dev Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hanjun Kim's Dev Blog

item.title: Troubleshooting PuTTYgen "Couldn't load private key (not a recognized key file format)" Error
item.description: My story about troubleshooting PuTTYgen's “Couldn't load private key (not a recognized key file format)” error. In short: save key files with ANSI encoding in Notepad

item.title: Creating Tray Icons using Go in Windows - Part 2
item.description: Continued from the last post - Creating Tray Icons using Go in Windows - Part 1, we will show some balloon notificationsto users and interact with them.

item.title: Creating Tray Icons using Go in Windows - Part 1
item.description: In this tutorial, we will create Windows tray icons(a.k.a. NotifyIcon) with relatively small chunk of Go code.
